Description: Book of the Dead of Ani; frame 19; full colour vignettes; plain double-borders; spell 15 continued; litany to Osiris and hymn to Sungod.
Curator's comments: Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 100.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (24)
Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 4)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134357) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134357)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, fractured Black ink Red ink Pigment; faded, flaking, friable Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: Filmoplast T self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
